questions.text: How long have you smoked (Regular Brand)?
What is the regular brand of cigarettes you smoked most often before you began smoking?
questions.note: Record under Q.2 on grid. If Kent Golden Lights or variation of Kent Golden Lights, also record exact wording on fly sheet.

questions.text: What other brands, if any, have been bought for your use either by you or by someone else in the past three months? What others?
questions.note: Record under Q.3 on grid. Exact wording on fly sheet.

questions.text: What other brands of cigarettes have you heard of?
What brands of cigarettes have you seen advertised in the past three months?
questions.note: Record under Q.5 on grid. If Kent Golden Lights or variations of Kent Golden Lights, also record exact wording on fly sheet.

questions.text: Ask for Kent Golden Lights, Merit, and Vantage if each not mentioned as regular brand or in Q2, Q3, Q4, Q5.
Have you seen advertising for BRAND in the past three months?
